content: all sts in k on next round using your favorite stretchy bobble method finishing - block to measurements gently steaming the butterfly stitch section to relax the stitches weave in all ends ©2025 plymouth yarn company 080625jbt abbrevations beg= beginning bobble= bind off co= cast on cont= continue k = knit k2tog= knit two stitches together mm= millimeter pm= place marker p = purl repeat= repeat sl = slip st s = stitch es st st = stockinette st decrease = together round- round wyif= with yarn in front yo= yarn over
